description.en: A former sergeant of the Guardian Corps that goes by the name of Lightning. In an effort to save her one and only sister、 she gives up everything she has to battle against destiny. While her unsociable demeanor once made her seem unapproachable、 she realizes that she is not alone during her journey、 ultimately opening her heart to others.
description.jp:
「ライトニング」と名乗るコクーン
聖府警備軍の元軍曹。
最愛の妹セラを救うため 全てを捨て
運命に立ち向かう。自他に厳しく近寄
りがたい人物だったが 旅を通して同じ
境遇の仲間たちと固い絆で結ばれ希望
を胸に戦いつづけた。

name.jp: コールアビリティ_ライトニング

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Sparkstrike (C)]:
• Slightly raises BRV gain based on Max BRV
• BRV stolen can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
• Special effect duration +3
rank_up_desc.jp:
「スパークブロウ【C】」使用時
・最大BRV依存のBRV加算量小アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの180％分
・使用後特殊効果の3ACTION期間延長

desc.en: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.gl: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 近距離物理攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.en: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.en:
3-HIT Thunder melee BRV attack
Grants [Ravager] for 3 turns and removes [Commando]
Lowers Action Delay if target is broken

[Ravager] raises Max BRV and Speed
desc.gl: 3-hit Thunder melee BRV attack\nSelf: 3 turns Ravager (cancels Commando)\nRaises turn rate when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
desc.jp:
3HIT雷属性近距離物理BRV攻撃
自身に3ACTION「ブラスター」付与
「アタッカー」解除
対象ブレイク時 ブレイク中攻撃時 行動負荷ダウン

desc.gl: Ravager: Raises MAX BRV and SPD
desc.jp: ブラスター：最大BRV 素早さが上昇する

desc.en:
3-HIT melee BRV + HP attack
Grants [Commando] stance for 3 turns and removes [Ravager]
Lowers Action Delay if target is broken

[Commando] raises Max BRV and Attack
desc.gl: 3-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack\nSelf: 3 turns Commando (cancels Ravager)\nRaises turn rate when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
desc.jp:
3HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
自身に3ACTION「アタッカー」付与
「ブラスター」解除
対象ブレイク時 ブレイク中攻撃時 行動負荷ダウン

desc.gl: Commando: Raises MAX BRV and ATK
desc.jp: アタッカー：最大BRV 攻撃力が上昇する

desc.en:
1-HIT BRV + HP attack
Followed by a 2-HIT BRV+HP attack
Followed by another 2-HIT BRV+HP attack
Raises BRV potency if target is broken
Restores own HP based on total HP damage dealt up to 10% Max HP
If the healing amount exceeds Max HP, the excess is converted to BRV
Delays the target by 1 turn
Grants [Knight of Etro] for 3 turns
Does not consume ability use on the next turn

While [Ravager] is active:
• Becomes [Army of One+]
　∟ Delays the target by 2 turns

[Knight of Etro] has the following effects:
• Grants Thunder Enchant
• Raises Max BRV and Attack
• When target is broken, nullifies Action Delay and grants a free turn that Does not increase the turn count
desc.gl:
Melee BRV attack + HP attack, followed twice by 2-hit BRV attack + HP attack
Increased BRV damage when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
Moderate HP recovery based on cumulative HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 10% of MAX HP; HP recovered in excess of MAX HP added to BRV
Delays target 1 turn
Self: 3 turns Knight of Etro
Next turn after use does not consume ability use count
Becomes Army of One+ while Ravager active
Inflicting Break while Knight of Etro active grants additional turn; inflicting Break during additional turn does not grant another
Additional turn does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support
desc.jp:
近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃の後
2HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃し
さらに2HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
対象ブレイク時 ブレイク中攻撃時 BRV威力がアップ
与えた合計HPダメージに応じて自身のHP中回復
回復量の上限は 自身の最大HPの10％分
最大HPを超えてHPが回復した時 超えたHP分 自身のBRVに加算
対象の行動順を1つ下げる
自身に3ACTION「女神の騎士」付与
使用後 次の行動時 アビリティの使用回数を消費しない（一部のアビリティを除く）
「ブラスター」付与中「シーンドライブ＋」に変化
「女神の騎士」付与中 ターゲットブレイク時 行動負荷がなくなり 追加行動が可能
バーストモード中は発生せず バーストモード終了後に1回のみ発生
追加行動でターゲットをブレイクしても 追加行動は発生しない
自身の追加行動は総ACTION数に加算されない
バーストモード中 召喚中およびフレンドサポートの残りACTIONは消費される

desc.gl:
Melee BRV attack + HP attack
Increases BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt
2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
Increases BRV by 20% of cumulative HP damage dealt
2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
Increased BRV damage when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Moderately restores own HP based on cumulative HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 10% of own MAX HP; HP recovered in excess of MAX HP added to BRV
Target: 4 turns Thunder Resist Down from first HP attack
Delays target 1 turn
Self: 5 turns Knight of Etro
Next turn after use does not consume ability use count
Becomes Army of One+ while Ravager active
Inflicting Break while Knight of Etro active grants additional turn; inflicting Break during additional turn does not grant another
Additional turn does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support
desc.jp:
近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
＋与えたHPダメージの20％分自身のBRVをアップ＋2HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
＋与えた合計HPダメージの20％分自身のBRVをアップ＋2HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
対象ブレイク時 ブレイク中攻撃時 BRV威力がアップ
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する 上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
与えた合計HPダメージに応じて自身のHP中回復 回復量の上限は 自身の最大HPの10％分
最大HPを超えてHPが回復した時 超えたHP分 自身のBRVに加算
最初のHP攻撃時に対象に4ACTION「雷耐性ダウン」付与 対象の行動順を1つ下げる
自身に5ACTION「女神の騎士」付与
使用後 次の行動時 アビリティの使用回数を消費しない（一部のアビリティを除く）
「ブラスター」付与中「シーンドライブ＋」に変化
「女神の騎士」付与中 ターゲットブレイク時 行動負荷がなくなり 追加行動が可能
バーストモード中は発生せず バーストモード終了後に1回のみ発生
追加行動でターゲットをブレイクしても 追加行動は発生しない
自身の追加行動は総ACTION数に加算されない
バーストモード中 召喚中およびフレンドサポートの残りACTIONは消費される

desc.en:
「Sparkstrike」 use +2

When using 「Sparkstrike」, 「Sparkstrike+」:
- 「Ravager」 becomes a stackable buff (max 2 stacks)
- Grants 1 stack of 「Ravager」 
- Increase the Max BRV Up effect of 「Ravager」
- The effects of 「Ravager」 do not change based on stacks
- Extends the duration of granted buffs by 3 turns
- Triggers an HP attack after use

When using 「Sparkstrike」:
- Tremendously raises its potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 110% Max BRV
- Raises BRV based on 10% of inflicted HP damage

While 「Ravager II」 is active:
- Turns 「Flourish of Steel」 into 「Flourish of Steel+」 with the following effects:
　+ Tremendously raises its potency
　+ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV

While 「Ravager」 is active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 into 「BRV Attack+ (Ravager)」 with the following effects:
　+ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　+ Greatly raises its total potency
　+ Increases 「Ravager」 buff by 1 stack
- Turns 「HP Attack」 into 「HP Attack+ (Ravager)」 with the following effects:
　+ Raises BRV based on Attack before a 1-HIT melee BRV+HP attack
　+ Increases 「Ravager」 buff by 1 stack
desc.gl:
Sparkstrike use +2

When using Sparkstrike, Sparkstrike+:
 • Ravager becomes level based; grants 1 level of Ravager (limit 2)
 • Slight Ravager MAX BRV Up boost (does not increase based on level)
 • Granted buff duration +3
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

When using Sparkstrike:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 110%
 • Increases BRV by 10% of HP damage dealt

While 2 levels of Ravager active:
 • Flourish of Steel becomes Flourish of Steel+ (tremendous BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%)

While Ravager active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Ravager) (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage; increases active Ravager level by 1)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Ravager) (increases BRV based on ATK; melee BRV attack + HP attack; increases active Ravager level by 1)

- Deals 2-HIT melee BRV + HP attack
　∟ + 3-HIT melee BRV + HP attack
　∟ + 4-HIT melee BRV + HP attack instead
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency

While 「Ravager」 is active:
- Turns 「HP Attack」, 「HP Attack+ (Ravager)」 into 「HP Attack++ (Ravager)」
　∟ Raises BRV based on Attack
　∟ + Melee BRV + HP attack
　∟ Slightly raises BRV potency compared to 「HP Attack+ (Ravager)」
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Increases 「Ravager」 stacks by 1

While 「Commando」 is active:
- Turns 「HP Attack」, 「HP Attack+ (Commando)」 into 「HP Attack++ (Commando)」
　∟ Raises BRV based on Attack
　∟ + 2-HIT Melee BRV+HP Attack
　∟ Tremendoysly raises total BRV potency compared to 「HP Attack+ (Commando)」
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Increases 「Commando」 stacks by 1

When using Army of One, Army of One+:

While Ravager active:
HP Attack, HP Attack+ (Ravager) becomes HP Attack++ (Ravager)
 • Increases BRV based on ATK + melee BRV attack + HP attack; tremendous BRV damage boost over HP Attack+ (Ravager)

While Commando active:
HP Attack, HP Attack+ (Commando) becomes HP Attack++ (Commando)
